start.new_user_greeting: Hello! I'm SwingBuddy, your swing dancing community assistant. Let's get you set up!
start.returning_user: Welcome back, {name}! How can I help you today?
start.language_selected: Great! I'll communicate with you in English from now on.
start.ask_name: What's your name? (This will help me personalize our conversations)
start.ask_location: What's your location? (This helps me show you relevant local events)
start.setup_complete:
Perfect! Your setup is complete. You can now:

â€¢ Browse upcoming swing dance events
â€¢ Register for events
â€¢ Get notifications about new events
â€¢ Connect with other dancers

Type /help to see all available commands!
